requirements.summary: Build prompt input interface with text area, submit button, Enter key support, loading state, and auto-clear after submission
acceptanceCriteria: Text area is visible and accepts multi-line input
Submit button and Enter key both trigger submission
Loading spinner or indicator is shown while waiting for response

file_operations.description: Create a controlled prompt input component with a text area for multi-line input, a submit button, and loading state management. Handle Enter key (without Shift) to submit, clear input after submission, and display a loading indicator while awaiting backend response. Use the core-infrastructure component to call backend.submitPrompt(). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Build conversation display area rendering prompt/response history as a chat-style thread with user messages right-aligned, AI responses left-aligned, auto-scroll, and empty state
acceptanceCriteria: User messages shown right-aligned with distinct styling
AI responses shown left-aligned with distinct styling
Conversation scrolls to the latest message automatically
Empty state message shown when no conversation exists

file_operations.description: Create a conversation display component that renders an array of Exchange objects (from backend interface) as a chat-style thread. User prompts appear right-aligned; AI responses appear left-aligned with distinct styling. Implement auto-scroll to the latest message using useEffect and a ref. Display an empty state message when no conversation exists. Use the core-infrastructure component to call backend.getHistory(). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Add 'Clear Conversation' button that calls clearHistory() and resets the displayed conversation thread
acceptanceCriteria: Button is visible in the UI
Clicking it calls clearHistory on the backend
The conversation display resets to the empty state after clearing

file_operations.description: Add a 'Clear Conversation' button to the conversation display component. On click, call backend.clearHistory() and reset the local conversation state to an empty array, triggering the empty state display. Use the core-infrastructure component to access the backend. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Apply sleek dark-mode editorial visual theme with warm charcoal/dark beige background, off-white text, rose/blush accents, and refined sans-serif typeface across all UI elements
acceptanceCriteria: Warm dark background color applied globally
Accent color (rose/blush) used for send button and active states
All text uses a refined sans-serif font
Theme is consistent across header, chat area, input, and buttons

file_operations.description: Update global CSS to apply a warm dark editorial theme. Set the body background to a warm charcoal/dark beige color, default text to off-white, and define CSS custom properties for rose/blush accent colors. Import and apply a refined sans-serif font (e.g., Inter, Outfit, or system-ui fallback).

Extend the Tailwind theme with custom colors matching the warm dark editorial palette: charcoal/dark beige backgrounds, off-white text, and rose/blush accent colors. Configure typography to use a refined sans-serif font family.

Apply theme-consistent styling to the prompt input component: warm dark background for the text area, off-white text, and rose/blush accent color for the submit button and active states using Tailwind utility classes.

Apply theme-consistent styling to the conversation thread component: warm dark background, off-white text for messages, and distinct styling for user (right-aligned, subtle rose tint) vs. AI (left-aligned, neutral warm tone) message bubbles using Tailwind utility classes.

requirements.summary: Render the generated hero background image as a static asset in the app header or page background
acceptanceCriteria: Image displays correctly as a background or header decoration without routing through the backend

file_operations.description: Create an app header component that displays the generated hero background image (frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-bg.dim_1440x900.png) as a background decoration. Load the image as a static asset using the public path /assets/generated/hero-bg.dim_1440x900.png. Include a logo icon (frontend/public/assets/generated/logo-icon.dim_128x128.png) and the app title 'PromptAI Studio' with theme-consistent styling.

Wire the AppHeader component into the main App layout at the top of the page. Integrate PromptInput and ConversationThread components into the main content area below the header. Manage conversation state and lift state up to coordinate between input and display components.
